resources.name: update movie JSON by id
resources.description:
This request updates a movie with a specified id, and returns an action response object with two fields:

- `type` = http request type (PUT)
- `updated` = resource representation of object updated

_**Endpoint Syntax**_: `/v1/movies/alter/updateById/:id`
- `id` = \_id field of movie to be deleted

---

- Body JSON sent in PUT request contains the fields and their new-values to update in the movie selected by id.

```response:200
{
	"type": "PUT",
	"updated": {
		"_id": 18,
		"title": "Black Panther",
		"phase": 3,
		"IMDb_rating": 7.3,
		"release_date": "2018-02-16",
		"release_year": 2018,
		"running_time": 0,
		"rating_name": "PG-13",
		"watched": true,
		"budget": 200000000,
		"gross": 1384000000,
		"misc_tags": [
			"top-rated"
		]
	}
}
```

resources.name: update movie JSON(s) by query string
resources.description:
This request updates query-matching movies and returns an action response object with two fields:

- `type` = http request type (PUT)
- `updated` = resource representation of object(s) updated

_**Endpoint Syntax**_: `/v1/movies/alter/update?<queryString>`

---

- Body JSON sent in PUT request contains the fields and their new-values to update in the movies which match the query string

- passing no <queryString> at all at this endpoint leads to selecting all movies in DB to update
	
```response:200
{
"type": "PUT",
"updated": [
	{
		"_id": 34,
		"title": "X-Men",
		"phase": 0,
		"IMDb_rating": 7.4,
		"release_date": "2000-07-14",
		"release_year": 2000,
		"running_time": 104,
		"rating_name": "PG",
		"watched": true,
		"budget": 75000000,
		"gross": 235000000,
		"misc_tags": [
			"top-rated"
		],
		"__v": 0
	}
]
}
```

resources.name: upload movie JSON
resources.description:
This request uploads a movie to the database and returns an action response object with two fields:

- `type` = http request type (POST)
- `received` = resource representation of object received and uploaded

_**Endpoint Syntax**_: `/v1/movies/alter/upload`

---

- Body JSON sent in POST request will only be uploaded to database if it passes Schema Validation [see models/movie.js]

```response:200
{
	"type": "POST",
	"received": {
		"_id": 36,
		"title": "Fantastic Four",
		"phase": 0,
		"IMDb_rating": 5.7,
		"release_date": "2005-07-08",
		"release_year": 2005,
		"running_time": 125,
		"rating_name": "PG",
		"watched": true,
		"budget": 100000000,
		"gross": 330000000,
		"misc_tags": []
	}
}
```

resources.name: delete movie JSON by id
resources.description:
This request deletes a movie with specified \_id and returns an action response object with two fields:

- `type` = http request type (DELETE)
- `deleted` = resource representation of object deleted

_**Endpoint Syntax**_: `/v1/movies/alter/removeById/:id`
- `id` = \_id field of movie to be deleted

```response:200
{
	"type": "DELETE",
	"removed": {
		"_id": 36,
		"title": "Batman v. Superman",
		"phase": 0,
		"IMDb_rating": 7.4,
		"release_date": "2003-05-02",
		"release_year": 2003,
		"running_time": 133,
		"rating_name": "PG",
		"watched": true,
		"budget": 110000000,
		"gross": 406000000,
		"misc_tags": [
			"top-rated"
		],
		"__v": 0
	}
}
```

resources.name: retrieve all movie JSONs
resources.description:
This request returns an array of all `movie objects` (documents) from database.

_**Endpoint Syntax**_: `/v1/movies/query`

```response:200
[
	{
		"_id": 1,
		"title": "Iron Man",
		"phase": 1,
		"IMDb_rating": 7.9,
		"release_date": "2008-05-02",
		"release_year": 2008,
		"running_time": 126,
		"rating_name": "PG-13",
		"watched": true,
		"budget": 140000000,
		"gross": 318298180,
		"misc_tags": [
			"top-rated"
		]
	},
	...and so on
]
```

resources.name: retrieve movie JSONs by query string
resources.description:
This request returns an array of all `movie objects` which **match the specified query string** in the request.

_**Endpoint Syntax**_: `/v1/movies/query?<queryString>`


```response:200
[
	{
		"_id": 4,
		"title": "Thor",
		"phase": 1,
		"IMDb_rating": 7,
		"release_date": "2011-05-06",
		"release_year": 2011,
		"running_time": 115,
		"rating_name": "PG-13",
		"watched": true,
		"budget": 150000000,
		"gross": 181015141,
		"misc_tags": []
	},
	{
		"_id": 5,
		"title": "Captain America: The First Avenger",
		"phase": 1,
		"IMDb_rating": 6.9,
		"release_date": "2011-07-22",
		"release_year": 2011,
		"running_time": 124,
		"rating_name": "PG-13",
		"watched": true,
		"budget": 140000000,
		"gross": 176636816,
		"misc_tags": []
	}
]
```

resources.name: retrieve sorted movie JSONs
resources.description:
This request returns an array of all `movie objects` in a sorted matter; ascending or descending.

_**Endpoint Syntax**_: `/v1/movies/sort/:order/:numerical_field`

- `:order` = either ascending or descending
	* [ asc , desc ]
- `:numerical_field` = any Number-type fields from movie object (see Schema)
	* [ \_id , phase , IMDb\_rating , release\_year , running\_time , budget , gross ]
	
	
```response:200
[
	{
		"_id": 27,
		"title": "Spider-Man: No Way Home",
		"phase": 4,
		"IMDb_rating": 8.8,
		"release_date": "2021-12-17",
		"release_year": 2021,
		"running_time": 150,
		"rating_name": "PG-13",
		"watched": true,
		"budget": 200000000,
		"gross": 1500000000,
		"misc_tags": [
			"top-rated",
			"now-playing"
		]
	},
	{
		"_id": 19,
		"title": "Avengers: Infinity War",
		"phase": 3,
		"IMDb_rating": 8.4,
		"release_date": "2018-05-04",
		"release_year": 2018,
		"running_time": 149,
		"rating_name": "PG-13",
		"watched": true,
		"budget": 316000000,
		"gross": 2048359754,
		"misc_tags": [
			"top-rated"
		]
	},
	... and so on, with decreasing IMDb_rating
]
```

resources.name: retrieve movie JSONs by tag
resources.description:
This request returns an array of all `movie objects` with the specified tag in the `misc_tags` array.

_**Endpoint Syntax**_:  `/v1/movies/category/:tag`

- `:tag` = labels attached to 'misc_tags' array which provide info or identification for movies
	* default tags (if any): [ top-rated , now-playing, upcoming ]
	
```response:200
[
	{
		"_id": 25,
		"title": "Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings",
		"phase": 4,
		"IMDb_rating": 7.5,
		"release_date": "2021-09-03",
		"release_year": 2021,
		"running_time": 132,
		"rating_name": "PG-13",
		"watched": true,
		"budget": 175000000,
		"gross": 363400000,
		"misc_tags": [
			"top-rated",
			"now-playing"
		]
	},
	{
		"_id": 26,
		"title": "Eternals",
		"phase": 4,
		"IMDb_rating": 6.8,
		"release_date": "2021-11-05",
		"release_year": 2021,
		"running_time": 157,
		"rating_name": "PG-13",
		"watched": false,
		"budget": 200000000,
		"gross": 300000000,
		"misc_tags": [
			"now-playing"
		]
	},
	... and so on
]
```

resources.name: retrieve movie JSONs by tag and query string
resources.description:
This request returns an array of all `movie objects` which have the specified tag in the `misc_tags` field array and match the query string.

_**Endpoint Syntax**_:  `/v1/movies/category/:tag?<queryString>`

- `:tag` = labels attached to 'misc_tags' array which provide info or identification for movies
	* The default labels (if any): [ top-rated , now-playing, upcoming ]
	
	
```response:200
[
	{
		"_id": 26,
		"title": "Eternals",
		"phase": 4,
		"IMDb_rating": 6.8,
		"release_date": "2021-11-05",
		"release_year": 2021,
		"running_time": 157,
		"rating_name": "PG-13",
		"watched": false,
		"budget": 200000000,
		"gross": 300000000,
		"misc_tags": [
			"now-playing"
		]
	}
]
```
